page.title: 04A DAY AT FISHBURN SCHOOL.
page.content: EVERY WEEKDAY MORNING I CALL FOR MY FRIEND AND WE COME TO SCHOOL AT 8.45 A.M.BEFORE WE GO INTO SCHOOL AT{9.00. WE{TALK OR PLAY}IN THE{SCHOOL YARD. WHEN WE GO INTO THE{CLASSROOM}OUR NAMES ARE CALLED FROM A{REGISTER}SO THE TEACHER KNOWS WHO IS PRESENT.NEXT, WE GO INTO THE HALL FOR{ASSEMBLY.}WE SING HYMNS AND PRAY.THE{HEADMASTER FINISHES BY GIVING US NEWS AND MESSAGES.FOR THE REST OF THE MORNING WE HAVE{MATHS}OR{ENGLISH.}WE HAVE A 10 MINUTE BREAK AT 10.40.IN THE YARD. AT 12.00 WE HAVE LUNCH.AT 1.15 P.M.WE BEGIN THE AFTERNOON SESSION.THIS LASTS UNTIL{3.45}WHEN SCHOOL IS FINISHED. AFTERNOON LESSONS INCLUDE{P.E,GAMES, {ART,TOPIC,SCIENCE.}SOMETIMES WE HAVE {TELEVISION OR RADIO}PROGRAMMES.WE HAVE A BREAK BETWEEN LESSONS AT 2.30.EACH WEEK WE GO SWIMMING.WE EVEN HAVE CLUBS AFTER SCHOOL FOR OTHER ACTIVITIES.
